synopsis.text: An exclusive to Amazon Prime Japan Video, this heartwarming anime follows the story of Foo, a gentle and kind-hearted boy who resides with his beloved grandmother. Friendless and often alone, Foo's life takes a turn when he ventures into the mountains to gather herbs for his ailing grandmother. Lost and frightened, he encounters an unlikely savior in Smoochy, a vibrant red-skinned demon boy. Both boys, despite their differences, find solace in their shared loneliness and quickly become inseparable friends. Their days are filled with joy and laughter until Foo's sudden absence from the mountain leaves Smoochy wondering what happened. Will the two friends reunite once more? Join Foo and Smoochy on their emotional journey of friendship and self-discovery.
